channel.title: Its a long shot, but does ANYBODY have this router?
channel.description:
First thing's first, it's NetComm, if you don't have NetComm, leave now (unless you're extremely familiar with them). The model: NetComm NB5plusADSL2+
If you have a NetComm or this router, please help.
I can do the port fowarding fine, I'm good at that, the only thing is, I save the settings and go to restart my router, but once it's back online the Custom Port Foward' is gone! Any help?

item.title: Its a long shot, but does ANYBODY have this router?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Select save and reboot. Not just reboot.

Read full topic
item.source: Its a long shot, but does ANYBODY have this router?

item.title: Its a long shot, but does ANYBODY have this router?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

i had same probeblem down at my dads (but i have a dsl) so i used the pfconfig, its better than manual portforwarding

Read full topic
